name: The Boneyard
description:
The Boneyard (v2.0)

You find yourself at the gate of a cemetery on your nightly stroll. Shortly after entering, you encounter a ghost! The ghost has lost track of its bones and cannot find peace without them...

The ghost will need your help if it is to ever rest again.

CREDITS

The Boneyard was made possible by Adam Le Doux's Bitsy Game Maker (v7.2)

original music by Vanessa Seymour using BeepBox

I am the sole designer of this game and its narrative. Code hacks I used to create it were provided by:

- Bitsy FAQ

- GitHub Bitsy Hacks
